author: IGN
description:
Watch the Cinematic Trailer for Omega Redux, a sci-fi action-adventure exploration game developed by VAZA Games. Players will embark on an episodic journey to explore worlds an hour before they meet their permanent end. Search for artifacts as a relic hunter alongside a robot companion and escape before time runs out. Omega Redux is launching on November 30 for PC (Steam).

#OmegaRedux #Gaming #IGN
title: Omega Redux - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Expansion Pass Trailer for ARK: Lost Colony, a new original expansion pack developed by Studio Wildcard for ARK: Survival Ascended. Players can enhance their experience with the Lost Colony Expansion Pass fitted with exclusive bonuses such as a Veilwyn Companion, early access to the Lost Skill Tree, and more for players to enjoy. The Expansion Pass Trailer for ARK: Lost Colony is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ArkLostColony #Gaming #IGN
title: ARK: Lost Colony - Official Expansion Pass Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Gears of War Reloaded brings back the original Gears of War, remastered from the ground up with 4K resolution, 120 fps support, and cross-play across more platforms than ever. And now, even PlayStation 5 users get to join the fight. With the multiplayer beta underway, it’s time to rev up our chainsaws and get dirty so whether you’re new to the Gears of War franchise or a longtime fan looking to shake off the rust, here are some helpful tips to improve your game in Gears of War Reloaded multiplayer.

Timecodes
Intro - 0:00
Turn Off Camera Shake - 0:32
Prioritize Mastering Active Reloads - 0:51
Use Tac-Com to Plan Your Next Move - 1:26
Use Opponent Frag Grenades Against Them - 1:52
Wall Bouncing Isn’t What You Think - 2:11
Focus on Power Weapons - 3:17
The Gnasher is EVERYTHING - 3:58
Listen for Audio Cues - 4:36
Pay Attention to Spawn Swap - 5:00
Remember to Slow Down - 5:20
Outro - 5:58

#GearsOfWarReloaded #Gaming #IGN
title: Gears of War: Reloaded - DOMINATE Multiplayer With These Tips

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Announcement Trailer for Mexican Ninja, a single-player, stylized beat ’em up action roguelike game developed by Madbricks. Players will slice, kick, and flip through the streets of Nuevo Tokyo in action-packed 2.5D frenetic gameplay. Upgrade skill trees, defeat powerful bosses, and become the Mexican Ninja. Mexican Ninja is slated for release in early 2026 for PC (Steam).

#MexicanNinja #Gaming #IGN
title: Mexican Ninja - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Rally & Recon Update Trailer for Tempest Rising, an action real-time strategy game developed by Splitgate Ironworks. Players can now access the new Rally & Recon Update fitted with a variety of highly requested features and new content, like six more maps, Spectator Mode V1, the ability to increase population cap, 2v2 Ranked mode, queue with friends, and more. The Rally & Recon Update is available now for PC (Steam).

#TempestRising #RallyAndReconUpdate #Gaming
title: Tempest Rising - Official Rally & Recon Update Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get another peek at Amanda the Adventurer 3 in this latest teaser for the upcoming horror puzzle game, focusing on the strange, interactive 90s-style children's cartoon by the same name. As the finale to the trilogy, Amanda the Adventurer 3 follows Riley, the protagonist, as they venture into an abandoned Hameln Entertainment facility where the creepy cartoon was created. Amanda the Adventurer 3 will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.
title: Amanda The Adventurer 3 - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Rematch, an arcade online action football (soccer) game developed by Sloclap. Players will engage with a fast-paced and precise version of the game of football with arcade elements that's easy to pick up and play, yet hard to master all the same. Control one player on the field for an intense showdown of 5v5, or choose from a variety of quickplay modes, evolving tactics, and decisions to fit the moment-to-moment needs of the match. Rematch is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Rematch #Gaming #IGN
title: Rematch - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Unlocked 696, We dive into Xbox's next-gen hardware announcement and analyze what it means, what it doesn't, and discuss where Xbox is going.

This week’s show is Ryan McCaffrey, Michael Higham, Miranda Sanchez, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Handhelds Are Clearly Important to the Future of Xbox - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Blitz Royale Mobile Gameplay Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale developed by Epic Games. Players on mobile can now get familiar with the new Blitz Royale game mode, which is also available on all platforms and supports cross-play. The mode has a roguelike design in nature and offers 32-player fast-paced matches, perfectly tailored for the mobile experience, or if you want a quick taste of the action. Blitz Royale is available now in Fortnite.

#Fortnite #BlitzRoyale #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official Blitz Royale Mobile Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
title: How To Train Your Dragon’s Gerard Butler Is Still Thinking About Gamer & Says Its Ahead Of Its Time

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Beyond 912, Death Stranding is a hard game to explain, and the players who love it all seem to enjoy it for different reasons. While we’re waiting for the sequel, here’s a list of other games to check out that involve some similar mechanics, objectives, themes, obstacles, or weaponization of bodily fluids. From games with bleak, dystopian open worlds that you traverse on vehicles with bad gas mileage, like Days Gone and Avalanche’s 2015 Mad Max game, to games that are just about traversing rough terrain like Snowrunner or Mudrunner Expeditions, or games about making deliveries like Deliver At All Costs and Lake. And hey, if you like climbing stuff, there’s Jusant, and if you like throwing your bodily waste at enemies who are trying to steal your baby, there’s Yoshi’s Island.

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: Death Stranding 2: 13 More Games About Mail Delivery, Wastelands or Falling Over - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week, Daemon, Ryan, and Max analyze Xbox's recent announcement that they're partnering with AMD on multiple pieces of hardware, including the third-party ASUS ROG Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X handhelds, and the likely successor console to the Series X and S. What does this mean for Xbox's hardware future? How does this connect to their push for cloud gaming? And how does this affect Sony's future with the PlayStation 6? Plus we go over last week's poll results and we have a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming
title: First PS6, Xbox Next Details Analyzed – Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description: Enjoy this fresh look at gameplay from PowerWash Simulator 2, the follow-up to the hit zen-like powerwashing game that now adds things like multi-stage jobs, home base customization, a cat companion you can pet and take on every job, and more. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2968420/PowerWash_Simulator_2/
title: PowerWash Simulator 2: Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
28 Years Later, reviewed by Tom Jorgensen.

28 Years Later finds Danny Boyle and Alex Garland mining the last two decades of cultural strife to build a timely coming-of-age story full of beauty and brutality in equal measure. Newcomer Alfie Williams ably shoulders the harrowing plot, flanked on either side by similarly strong performances from Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Jodie Comer. Boyle has plenty of new tricks up his sleeves for how to shoot 28 Years Later in a way that evokes the spirit of the original without copying it, and the same goes for the action, which feels more like an evolution of 28 Days Later’s self-assured perspective on infected carnage rather than an attempt to outdo the running, biting hordes of imitators it inspired.Its scope is much more narrow than 28 Days Later’s, but its message is just as powerful.
title: 28 Years Later Review

author: IGN
description:
The Nintendo Switch 2 reviewed by Tom Marks.

The Switch 2 is a Switch but bigger and better in nearly every way, with all of its successes and most of its faults accounted for. Its hybrid nature is still just as good of an idea today as it was eight years ago, and a lot of its best games benefit massively from the beefier tech inside it that allows for 4K, higher framerates, and faster load times. But all of that feels more like Nintendo getting back to treading water as the Switch started to fall a little too far behind what people expected from their games rather than providing a compelling reason of its own for you to pay 50% more for this upgrade. The new Joy-Con take an impressively creative swing at giving you that reason, but while its innovative mouse controls are a game-changer on paper, they’re so ergonomically uncomfortable to use in practice that I can still feel the strain in my arm as I record this. The end result is a console I really like for all the same reasons I lo
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Review

author: IGN
title: Borderlands 4 is a "soft reboot" for the series

author: IGN
title: The one Donkey Kong Bananza mode that will surely be used appropriately #ignsummerofgaming

author: IGN
description:
We've genuinely enjoyed our time with Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, which we played an hour of during Summer Game Fest. It’s a kart racer that seems to nail the core idea of a good kart racer – fast and intense races, powerups that turn the tide and leave you salty, and a good vibe that celebrates the characters from its source material. We can’t really ask for much more than that, yet there’s still a lot to chew on that we haven’t seen in previous Sonic racing games.  It’s a vibe, and we look forward to drifting through when it launches on September 25 of this year on the last two PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo consoles, as well as PC. 

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by FX’s Alien: Earth. Premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.
Presented by Lenovo Legion. Reach Your Impossible
Presented by Nintendo Switch 2. All Together, Anytime, Anywhere.
Presented by MindsEye. Pre-Order Now
title: Sonic Racing CrossWorlds is a Blast and Celebrates Sega’s History

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Still Wakes the Deep: Siren's Rest in this extended gameplay trailer for the expansion to the narrative horror game. Still Wakes the Deep: Siren’s Rest is available now on Steam, Xbox via PC and Series X|S, Epic Games Store, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

Set over a decade after the events of Still Wakes the Deep, Siren’s Rest follows a diving crew as they explore the wreck of the Beira D oil rig, using a crowbar, cutting torch, and camera to unearth the final moments of the crew. Featuring an original story led by an all-new cast, Siren’s Rest is a chance to see the Beira D tragedy in a new light, and discover what still lurks in the darkness...
title: Still Wakes the Deep: Siren's Rest - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer
